Others: Jimmy Butler did not play in the fourth quarter against the New Orleans Pelicans.
The Miami Heat defeated the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night by a final score of 119-108.
This loss was New Orleans’ 11th-straight, making them the NBA’s worst team with a record of 5-29 on the season.
Jimmy Butler played just under 25 minutes in Wednesday’s win over the Pelicans.
Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra benched Butler for the entire fourth quarter because of his 13-day absence and how well the group he closed with was performing.
